settings.heading: How pasteurized is more effective than live Akkermansia muciniphila

settings.text:
After discovering the original strain, we spent years in search of a solution that was both safe and effective. Pasteurizing Akkermansia muciniphila turns it from a probiotic into a postbiotic. Probiotics are less stable, leaving them vulnerable to oxygen, stomach acid, and bile salts. Postbiotics reach your small intestine and colon more effectively due to their increased stability.*

Our pasteurized Akkermansia MucT™ gets to your gut more effectively and in greater quantity than live Akkermansia muciniphila products, making it the most bio-efficacious Akkermansia muciniphila supplement.*

settings.heading: From the scientists who discovered Akkermansia muciniphila

settings.text: Discovering and isolating Akkermansia muciniphila was only the beginning for The Akkermansia Company™. We combined our scientific breakthrough with science-backed ingredients to revolutionize your gut health.

settings.caption: Helps maintain your mucus membranes to aid digestion and nutrient absorption*

settings.text: Akkermansia muciniphila plays an essential role in strengthening your gut barrier—keeping beneficial bacteria in and harmful toxins out. By pasteurizing this crucial bacterium, we increase the accessibility of the protein Amuc-1100. This protein works alongside Akkermansia MucT™ to help replenish the valuable mucus in your gut barrier, helping to protect you against leaky gut and slow down the inflammatory response.*

settings.caption: Learn from real customers who have taken Healthy Weight

settings.heading: How often should I take The Akkermansia Company™  Healthy Weight supplement?
settings.row_content: Take one tablet per day or as directed by your. healthcare provider. Do not exceed the recommended daily dosage. Should not be taken on an empty stomach.

settings.heading: How should I store The Akkermansia Company™ supplements?
settings.row_content: Store in its original packaging at room temperature in a dry place away from direct sunlight. Unlike probiotics, postbiotics do not need to be refrigerated.

settings.heading: When will I notice a difference?
settings.row_content: While everyone varies, most people tend to feel a difference in their digestion after about one month of daily use.

settings.heading: What’s unique about The Akkermansia Company™ supplements?
settings.row_content: The Akkermansia Company™ is the only provider of Akkermansia muciniphila supplements to offer it in its most bio-efficacious form: pasteurized Akkermansia MucT™. In this form, it reaches your gut more effectively and in a greater quantity than live Akkermansia muciniphila products. Our pasteurized bacterium is the only European Food Safety Authority (EFSA) approved Akkermansia muciniphila supplement, and the only solution that has been clinically tested in humans.

settings.heading: How does Healthy Weight help me maintain my weight?
settings.row_content: In addition of the ingredient Akkermansia muciniphila MucT™, Chromium has been shown to positively affect one’s body composition (Source) by aiding the body’s use of insulin,* and Vitamin B2 has been shown to aid digestion and nutrient absorption* (Source). EGCG Green Tea has been clinically proven to aid in weight control* (Source).

settings.heading: Why do The Akkermansia Company™ supplements have a bi-layer tablet?
settings.row_content: One side of the tablet contains Akkermansia MucT™ (the lighter part) and the other side contains the additional scientifically proven ingredients. Any potential interactions and stability issues between pasteurised Akkermansia and the other ingredients has been in this way avoided, ensuring the product to be safe and efficient.

settings.heading: How long should people take The Akkermansia Company™ supplements?
settings.row_content: In some cases, individuals will feel the benefits of Akkermansia after a few weeks, while others will require more time. The proof-of-concept study in humans indicates that taking it daily for three months had a positive effect on the gut barrier, sugar and fat metabolism and liver function in people who have a metabolic syndrome including overweight or obesity and prediabetes.

settings.heading: What is the advantage of having 30 billion Akkermansia cells in our products?
settings.row_content: Our product contains 30 billion cells per dose, which, based on our clinical research, is a very effective daily dose. Indeed, our proof-of-concept study, where participants with metabolic syndrome and prediabetes took 30 billion cells of pasteurized Akkermansia MucT™ daily for 3 months, indicates a positive effect on insulin sensitivity and glucose metabolism. Moreover, a recent clinical study with the same dose of pasteurized Akkermansia MucT™ indicated that it improves gastrointestinal complaints in subjects with IBS. In addition, the European Food Safety Authority (EFSA) has concluded that it is safe to take up to 34 billion Akkermansia MucT™ cells per day.
